com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.http

Class MobileServiceHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.http.MobileServiceHttpClient

  • public class MobileServiceHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which centralizes the HTTP requests sent by the mobile services client.
